plot: A groom is trying to find his bride in a magical desert; there he will learn that the shortest way is not always the faster.
title: Desierto
plot_es: A groom is trying to find his bride in a magical desert; there he will learn that the shortest way is not always the faster.
plot_en: A groom is trying to find his bride in a magical desert; there he will learn that the shortest way is not always the faster.
